CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: -5.5 eV , which were much lower than the reported benzodithiophene-NT ( PBDT - DTNT ) based poly- mers , 20 illustrating that IDT was a good donor unit that can offer deep HOMO level and high V oc of the PSCs based on the target polymers can be anticipated.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. Benzodithiophene (BDT)
2. Poly-mers (PBDT-DTNT)
3. Polymers (PSCs)

Explanation:

1. Benzodithiophene (BDT) is a specific type of molecule mentioned in the paragraph as a comparison to the IDT (indacenodithiophene) unit.
2. Poly-mers (PBDT-DTNT) refers to a class of polymers that contain the BDT unit.
3. Polymers (PSCs) is a general term used to refer to a class of materials that are composed of long chains of repeating molecular units. In this context, the authors are discussing the potential of PSCs based on the target polymers, which are anticipated to have high V oc and deep HOMO levels due to the IDT unit.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph:

1. Benzodithiophene (BDT)
2. Indacenodithiophene (IDT)
3. Polymers (PSCs)

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Benzodithiophene (BDT) |
| Indacenodithiophene (IDT) |
| Polymers (PSCs) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: -5.5 eV , which were much lower than the reported benzodithiophene-NT ( PBDT - DTNT ) based poly- mers , 20 illustrating that IDT was a good donor unit that can offer deep HOMO level and high V oc of the PSCs based on the target polymers can be anticipated.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) level
2. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage)
3. IDT (Indacenodithiophene)
4. PBDT (Benzodithiophene-NT)
5. DTNT (Dithiophene-based Poly-mers)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

1. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) level
2. V oc (Open Circuit Voltage)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties. The other entities mentioned in the paragraph (e.g. "poly-mers", "PBDT", "DTNT") are not material properties, but rather chemical compounds or compositions.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) level |
| V oc (Open Circuit Voltage) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: -5.5 eV , which were much lower than the reported benzodithiophene-NT ( PBDT - DTNT ) based poly- mers , 20 illustrating that IDT was a good donor unit that can offer deep HOMO level and high V oc of the PSCs based on the target polymers can be anticipated.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. -5.5 eV: This is a numerical value that represents the energy level of the electrons in the material. It is a property value of the material.
2. 20: This is a numerical value that represents the number of polymers being referred to in the paragraph. It is a property value of the polymers.
3. PBDT: This stands for "benzodithiophene-NT," which is a type of polymer. It is a property name of the polymer.
4. DTNT: This stands for "dithiophene-based poly-mers," which is another type of polymer. It is a property name of the polymer.
5. V oc: This stands for "open-circuit voltage," which is a property value of the PSCs (photovoltaic cells) based on the target polymers.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are -5.5 eV, 20, PBDT, DTNT, and V oc.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. -5.5 eV: This is a numerical value that represents the energy level of the electrons in the material. It is a property value of the material.
2. V oc: This stands for "open-circuit voltage," which is a property value of the PSCs (photovoltaic cells) based on the target polymers.

Therefore, the only entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are -5.5 eV and V oc.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| -5.5 eV |
| V oc |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
